headline.main: Our Pacific Battle; Hard, Bloody Fighting Lies Ahead on Central Route Toward Japan

lead_paragraph: The continuation of bombing assaults on the Marshall Islands and Nauru in the Central Pacific support the belief that correspondents in Hawaii have expressed -- that there will be only a brief intermission before the next step in our new Central Pacific campaign.
